heading: HB07835
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE MUNICIPAL AGRICULTURE INFORMATION SYSTEM
status: Pending with the Committee on AGRICULTURE AND FOOD since 2018-07-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07835
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE MUNICIPAL AGRICULTURE INFORMATION SYSTEM
ABSTRACT : Aims to provide for the computerization and integration into a unified Agricultural Commodity Supply Inventory/Registry System of all information in the agricultural supply-demand chain; Provides that this centralized database under the Department of Agriculture shall interconnect farmers and organized communities all over the country with an easy-to-access data on real-time market demand, both local and global, for agricultural commodities, thus creating a wider range of market linkages to both farmers and agricultural buyers.
ALIAS NAME : “ Municipal Agriculture Information System Act ( M A I S Act) ”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-05-31
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2018-07-30
